name: A Shadow In The Halls
description:
See how many keys you can collect in a big creepy house.
Make sure to grab ammo when you can though, cause they are coming.


I made this game in 30 days for Halloween as a personal challenge.
It's a pretty straight forward first person shooter where you try and see how many keys you can collect in one life without getting caught by the monsters.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move
Mouse to shoot
F turn flashlight on and off
E to open doors and pickup items

Tips:

You need to keep grabbing ammo to survive long.   Holding up in a room with your back to the wall might feel safe, but you will run out of ammo.

WARNING:
The game has some slight flashing lights.
They flash pretty slow, but if you are sensitive to that you might want to avoid the game.
